entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this morning then 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 22 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Monday 27 March 2023
